living.gridCard_1SubTitle_1Block:
Our quest to find the solution to how ten billion people will live sustainably on our planet drives our vision, our values and our principles. our vision, our values and our principles. By nations predict that by 2100 there will be more than ten  billion people will live on the planet. Already today
 38% of the world's Co2 emissions are caused by the real estate and construction industry. For positive change, we need to rethink values rethink values and use technological advances to grow in a resource-efficient way. All our services focus on sustainability - we successfully implement international ESG standards successfully.

living.jumboDescription: Whether you are part of a global company or a private investor, our private investor, our platform offers you the right investment product investment product, connects you with the right planners or project developers, structures financing or financing or develops the right integration of PREA technology into your company.
living.livingGridCard_1_description: Our platform allows us to go beyond traditional beyond traditional real estate products and offer along the entire real estate real estate value chain. Our clients benefit from an increasingly range of unique investment opportunities in different in different risk classes, as well as our in-house developed artificial intelligence and our digital infrastructure PREA suite.
living.livingGridCard_2_description: We support you in choosing the right residential real estate, we manage complex purchase and sale and sales mandates, structure a financing or leasing financing or leasing offer for you or develop a portfolio and growth strategy with you growth strategy.
living.livingGridCard_3_description: With our project development services, we create profitable and sustainable growth that combines attractive returns with social value. Whether we develop plots of land, plan as architects - sustainability is at the forefront. We accompany projects through to turnkey handover.
living.livingGridCard_4_description: Tailermade solutions and residential reports are a small part of our artificial intelligence and automation processes for the valuation of residential real estate. Ideally suited for Portfolio valuations, growth strategies, acquisition financing or refinancing.
living.livingGridCard_moreInfoBuySell: Learn more about buying and selling
living.livingGridCard_support: Contact the Business Development Team, call 0800-7732-7732.

leadership.headerSubTitle: We are a technology and real estate company that connects the world of commercial real estate investments with the status quo of science and AI.

research-trends.headerSubTitle: You dont wanna wait and want our expertise in the Real Estate Industry. Don't hesitate and buy right away a PREA Report.

architecture.boxHeaderDescription_1: Sustainable buildings must be be developed for eternity.
architecture.boxHeaderDescription_2: Through multidisciplinary teams we are able teams, we can offer our clients a holistic advisory approach to our clients.
architecture.boxHeaderSubTitle_2: Project management from a single source
architecture.gridCardContent_1Card_1Block: PREA's ecosystem has digital access to all relevant data for baseline identification. And this is completely automated.
architecture.gridCardContent_1Card_2Block: On behalf of building owners we represent clients vis-à-vis municipalities and and municipalities and develop joint interests and solutions for and solutions for the development of a new building project.
architecture.gridCardContent_2Card_1Block: Thanks to mercury's data diversity, we understand municipalities and communities at first glance and know what is most important for preliminary planning.
architecture.gridCardContent_2Card_2Block: Our architectural office is authorised to submit building documents and develops and develops in its own name for owners and users.
architecture.gridCardContent_3Card_1Block: Forecasting socio-demographic trends and real estate market data gives us a unique opportunity to develop floor plans that are more cost-efficient, economical, sustainable and socially responsible.
architecture.gridCardContent_3Card_2Block: We accompany you with our architect and project development office conception to the establishment of a development plan procedure.
architecture.gridCardContent_4Card_2Block: Together, we develop suitable solutions for your personal business strategy, so that your business growth is guaranteed in the long term.
architecture.gridCardContent_5Card_1Block: An important step for the optimisation of construction costs is the symbiosis  between service phases 3 and 5 is created here.
architecture.gridCardContent_5Card_2Block: In times of ESG, the repositioning of existing real estate is considered one of the most important factors for achieving the goals of the Paris Agreement. We advise you on funding opportunities and the development of sustainable concepts that can withstand today's and tomorrow's markets.
architecture.gridCardContent_6Card_2Block: Does your company have real estate that is not used for its own purposes? We develop concepts and solutions for you on how to capitalise, develop or profitably sell these assets.
architecture.gridCardContent_7Card_2Block: Together with our AI mercury, specialist planners and project developers, we develop concepts and studies and map future scenarios for a better economic understanding.
architecture.gridCardContent_8Card_2Block: Together with our AI mercury, specialist planners and project developers, we develop concepts and studies and map future scenarios for a better economic understanding.
architecture.gridCardContent_9Card_2Block: We do not give you abstract advice, but make concrete suggestions that you can implement together with us or on your own.
architecture.gridCardTitle_6Card_2Block: CRE Corporate Real Estate Management: Capitalisation of non-operating real estate assets
architecture.gridImgAltCard_1Block: Woman fold out the plan for a Building
architecture.gridImgCard_1SubTitle_2Block: Our architect's office not only takes over the planning, but also the project management of all specialist planners from LP1 to LP5 and coordinates the entire team for a successful for a successful project.
architecture.gridImgCard_2SubTitle_2Block: We are specialists for the real estate industry. We know the industry, we know what's happening on the market. We cover the entire real estate value chain from land acquisition to project development and sales.
architecture.gridImgCard_2Title_1Block: Our architectural office is authorised to submit building documents and develops and develops in its own name for owners and users.
architecture.headerSubTitle: Wir bilden  die Konnektivität zwischen Fachmannsleistung und neuester Technologie um Gebäude für die Zukunft zu schaffen.

success-stories.boxHeader_description: Cases as we have designed with our architecture performance investments more sustainable and more effective.
success-stories.gridItem1_description: Architecture is not only how it looks and how it feels.  It's how well and sustainably it works. Our architects and engineers have access to more than 150 billion  billion data points to better understand the world of living and working  than ever before and translate it into the new reality. The  enables us to create sustainable products for the future.The art of building today  must be the architecture  of tomorrow.
success-stories.gridItem1_title: The art of building today  must be the architecture  of tomorrow.
success-stories.gridItem2_1_description: Forecasting socio-demographic trends and real estate market data market data gives us the unique opportunity to identify project-related project-related ESG criteria at an early stage and to integrate these and to integrate them at the start of planning.
success-stories.gridItem2_2_description: Our world is changing faster than ever. This makes it all the more flexibility and third-party usability at an early stage in order to flexibility and third party usability at an early stage in order to cost-efficiently at a later stage.
success-stories.gridItem2_3_description: Access to data has shaped our architects to be to plan more responsibly and conserve resources. enter into projects with a certain degree of self-criticism.
success-stories.gridItem2_4_description: Our planning office has access to our entire PREA team at all times. PREA team at all times. Interdisciplinary work in different sectors gives us the necessary knowledge to plan knowledge to plan projects in a targeted and cost-efficient manner.
success-stories.quote: Thanks to our AI mercury, our architects are able to independently provide the entire project development services.

development.boxHeaderDescription_1: Structured and fully digitized processes for real estate scouting.
development.boxHeaderDescription_2: Our sustainable guiding principle and the development of ESG modeling make us the right partner.
development.boxHeaderDescription_3: With our AI mercury we create a vision and understanding of the future.
development.boxHeaderSubTitle_2: Trust in expertise and a brand.
development.gridCardContent_1Card_1Block: Our digital ecosystem enables us to determine potential property data all over Germany and to acquire it via our in-house sales service.
development.gridCardContent_1Card_2Block: While we make our entire property know-how available to owners as part of rental contracts, we analyze the respective market for tenants with regard to suitable properties and negotiate space for them at the best possible rental conditions.
development.gridCardContent_1Card_3Block: Project management of development and building construction measures for residential, commercial and special construction. Tenders for GÜs and GUs, as well as the complete contract negotiations.
development.gridCardContent_2Card_1Block: Our 150 billion data points for our AI mercury allow us to use a digital process to identify existing properties with potential for appreciation
development.gridCardContent_2Card_2Block: Our interdisciplinary, holistic approach means that we work with mixed teams in which all the necessary qualifications are gathered at one table and make the right decisions with the right partners.
development.gridCardContent_2Card_3Block: We structure financing or leasing solutions in the equity and debt capital area for the entire value chain of a property. And that for every phase of development.
development.gridCardContent_3Card_3Block: We accompany the project development from the first day in the media with adapted marketing strategies and take over the entire transaction until the project exit.
development.gridCardTitle_2Card_2Block: Contract negotiations with planners, specialist planners and construction companies
development.gridImgAltCard_2Block: Client representation vis-à-vis the public sector.
development.gridImgCardQuote_1Block: Our AI mercury is unique on the market and that surprises the communities and identifies us as the right partner and client representative.
development.gridImgCard_1SubTitle_1Block: Our interdisciplinary, holistic approach means that we work with mixed teams in which all the necessary qualifications are gathered at one table.
development.gridImgCard_1SubTitle_2Block: We prove ourselves to be a partner right from the start of the first conversation, because with our AI mercury we immediately analyze risks, opportunities, weaknesses and strengths and make them available to the community unfiltered.
development.gridImgCard_1Title_2Block: Client representation vis-à-vis the public sector.
development.gridImgCard_2SubTitle_1Block: Access to over 150 billion data points gives us the creative freedom to create solutions for future development with all the project participants.
development.gridImgCard_2SubTitle_2Block: All service providers are dependent on fundamental data. Our AI mercury creates reports and discloses the variety of data to all partners. This enables us to have a quick process in obtaining building permits.
development.gridImgCard_2Title_2Block: Control of legal advisors, town planners and specialist planners.
development.headerSubTitle: With our innovative investment products along the entire real estate value chain, we create sustainable growth for investors.

success-stories.actionTitle_1_content: In the last few years, the AI ​​mercury has shown us many alternative scenarios for a project development which then significantly increased the return performance.
success-stories.actionTitle_2_content: Our experience has shown us that property planning services according to HOAI are best combined in-house with our project development department and do without external services.
success-stories.actionTitle_3_content: In January 2022 we signed the United Nations-supported Principles for Responsible Investment (PRI) to express our commitment to integrate ESG aspects into all projects supervised by PREA.
success-stories.actionTitle_4_content: With access to 150 billion evaluated data points, we can create individual ESG models that share with the municipalities and thereby accelerate building law processes.
success-stories.blockquote: Create maximum sustainability, deliver maximum results.
success-stories.boxHeader_content: Large and small projects, from the creation of building rights to the construction of entire residential areas
success-stories.gridItem_1_content: With our project development services we create profitable and sustainable growth that combines attractive returns with social value. Whether we develop land, structure financing or lease real estate - sustainability is anchored in every one of our projects. We advise, we develop and we accompany the project through to the turnkey handover.

investment.gridCardContent_1Card_1Block: Our transaction team consists of an interdisciplinary team of experienced real estate brokers, scientists and architects, equipped with the most powerful software solutions for the real estate industry for a smooth and agile transaction process. Our services at a glance.
investment.gridCardTitle_1Card_1Block: We digitise reality and create maximum values for a transparent deal.
investment.gridCardTitle_2Card_2Block: ESG modelling is more than just the environment.
investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_1Card_2Block:
We manage complex purchase and sale and sales mandates for commercial and residential properties with the support of our artificial intelligence intelligence and state-of-the-art software solutions.

 Applied science is the maxim. From the first question to the deal. We build a data pool of up to 150 billion data points, deliver previously unknown insights for a transparent transaction process.

For a successful sales process and the maximisation of proceeds we develop digital strategies for an effective target group approach. Just know the investors is no longer sufficient in the market.
investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_1Card_3Block: It is time to use the real estate market with the using the methods that have already been proven to improve investment decisions in other asset classes.
investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_1Card_4Block: Our AI-controlled matching system with the standardised requirement profiles is an integral part of our success in the buying and sales processes. Our technologies are publicly & proven with whitepapers.
investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_1Card_5Block:
One of the most important instruments for an effective target group approach is an international roadshow with investors as part of a structured structured bidding process. The art of negotiation and micro-politics has changed in our new world. Processes and meetings take place in digital places.

Controlling sales processes remotely requires new strategies and adaptation of traditional values. With the use of new technologies we capture more data which we analyse for the benefit of our clients and ensure that deals are placed more successfully.
investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_1Card_6Block: Every PREA product is designed from the ground up to protect privacy and data. We do not create user profiles, sell personal information and do not share data with third parties for marketing or advertising.
investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_1Card_7Block: We supply experts, specialist planners and with alternative data for a better understanding of a transaction. We create with our virtual rooms the link between investors, service providers and the deal.
investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_2Card_2Block: At PREA, we analyse your current portfolio and develop sustainability strategies that not only reduce reduce operating costs and energy consumption. ESG encompasses not only the environment, but also social and corporate governance. With the help of these strategies we values and prepare your property for a better for a better sales process.

The Preaversum offers a variety of process and report controlling.

investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_3Card_6Block: Data is our most valuable resource and all staff treat it accordingly. The data must not be leaked to the outside, and internal data traffic is strictly regulated. Team members can only access data if they have the appropriate have the appropriate authorisation.
investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_3Card_7Block: The right equity partner for the deal decision is essential. Individual deal maker reports facilitate decisions for investors, mezzanine lenders or alternative financing partners.

investment.gridCard_1SubTitle_4Card_6Block: For data and information processing, we rely on machine learning technologies and our intelligence mercury. We also pay attention to the ethical requirements for these technologies. We know that people can be unconsciously biased. The ethical aspects therefore also ensures that possible factors of bias are not implemented in the machine bias & machine learning algorithms.

Formulate results neutrally and objectively, so that our clients cannot be influenced by framing.

success-stories.actionTitle_1_content: With our AI mercury, we are in a position to quickly and accurately quickly deliver reliable data evaluations for real estate projects and uncover opportunities and risks immediately.
success-stories.actionTitle_2_content: The success stories begin with the selection of the right team. Our expertise of interdisciplinary teams of Data architects and real estate transaction managers are the characterise our success.
success-stories.actionTitle_3_content: Our digital processes have successfully shown us that automation and tracking processes allow us to report more effectively and spend more time on people business.
success-stories.actionTitle_4_content: All of our approaches and references are based on one single mission. How do we sustain our growth and share our planet with more than 10 billion people by 2100. People to share our planet Earth by 2100.
success-stories.blockquote: We evaluate every single transaction, create reports on the entire transaction process and use this data for training purposes and to improve our individual processes. Perfectionism is an process, not an aggregate state of aggregation.
success-stories.boxHeader_content: A small selection of our references.
success-stories.gridItem_1_content: With the help of artificial intelligence and innovative technologies, we have been able to identify oppurtunities that are not immediately visible and deliver results. immediately visible oppurtunities, and delivered results that were both results in terms of profitability, but also in terms of sustainability according to international ESG standards have led to a new benchmark
success-stories.gridItem_1_title: How we work with our the world with our better with our customers.

services.itemDescription_1: The support of complex purchase and sale mandates for commercial and residential real estate with the support of our in-house developed artificial intelligence and state-of-the-art software solutions.
services.itemDescription_2: We advise investors on all aspects of real estate financing and equity placement with the help of automated processes on our digital financing platform.
services.itemDescription_3: Applied science is the maxim. From the first question to the final result. Real estate valuation includes both the precise delivery of the results and their interpretation.
services.itemDescription_4: Our architects and engineers have access to more than 150 billion data points in order to understand the world of life and work better than ever and to transform it into a new reality.
services.itemDescription_5: We advise, we develop and we accompany the project up to the turnkey handover. Value-oriented expertise and digital transformation are the key factor for successful project developments.
services.itemDescription_6: For our multi-family office mandates we are constantly looking for new investment opportunities in the opportunistic to value add area in the DACH region and other locations.
services.itemLinkText_1: Learn more about our digital transaction processes.
services.itemLinkText_3: Learn more about our artificial intelligence mercury.
services.itemLinkText_4: Plan future-oriented real estate with our help.
services.itemLinkText_5: Find out more about our project development services.
services.itemLinkText_6: We will buy your property. Go to the requirements profile.

techusp.headerDescription: Die Konnektivität zwischen unseren intelligenten Technologien und dem Ökosystem der Immobilienindustrie ist das Herzstück von PREA und einer der fundamentalen Leitgedanken unserer Vision. Die Integration von intelligenten Backendsystemen, Entwicklung von zukunftsweisenden Apps vereinfachen Transaktionsprozesse, verbessern Reportings und automatisieren auf einem neuen Niveau den ImmobilienResearch. Für unsere Kunden ein bisher noch nie dagewesenes Erlebnis.
techusp.headerTitle: Wie wir mit Technologie die Weltverändern.

valuation.boxHeaderDescription_1: Connectivity between our smart technologies and the real estate and ecosystem of the real estate and construction industry has always been at the heart of PREA and has been one of our fundamental foundation. Everything we do is guided by the belief that investors, owners and occupiers need the clarity to act at any point in the at every point in the real estate cycle in order to make more informed decisions, grow more sustainably and achieve better results.

valuation.gridCard_1SubTitle_1Card_2Block: The United Nations forecasts that the population will grow by 10.87 billion people by the year 2100. We are aware that we humans spend more than 90% of our lives in real estate, and that already today the existing structures in the real estate industry are responsible for more than 38% of global CO2 emissions. Acting sustainably within the industry therefore challenges within the industry. With our AI mercury, we have been working since the very day we have been working on how to track and evaluate the environment, socailes and evaluate. Our quest to solve how ten billion people will live sustainably on our planet live sustainably in our world is what drives our vision, our values and our principles.

valuation.headerSubTitle: Mercury has the answer to your questions. Quickly and reliably. We show you why real estate research no longer works without artificial intelligence.

success-stories.actionTitle_1_content: With our AI mercury we are able to deliver targeted and reliable data evaluations for real estate projects quickly and to uncover opportunities and risks straight away.
success-stories.actionTitle_2_content: We are constantly developing new methodologies, alternative approaches and collecting new data. Everything for our mission to make the world more sustainable and deliver better results to our customers.
success-stories.actionTitle_3_content: ESG encompasses more than just the environment and resource consumption of raw materials. We also cover social and entrepreneurial aspects.
success-stories.actionTitle_4_content: All of our methodologies comprise an unimaginable number of whitepapers that scientifically substantiate all of our approaches and are made available to every PREA customer.
success-stories.blockquote: Everything we do is based on the belief that investors, owners and users need clarity at every point in the real estate cycle. For more informed decisions, better results and more sustainable growth.
success-stories.boxHeader_content: Numbers and facts create security and trust. Projects that are subject to our analysis technology.
success-stories.gridItem_1_content: With our AI mercury we create profitable and sustainable growth that combines attractive returns with social value. Whether we develop land, structure financing or lease real estate - sustainability is anchored in every one of our businesses. Real estate valuation includes both precise delivery of the results as well as their interpretation of ESG.

who-we-are.gridCard_2SubTitle_10Block: PREA Group is committed to accelerating systemic change towards a sustainable real estate world in all aspects. We demonstrate accountability and leadership by taking our ...

who-we-are.headerSubTitle_3: Our quest for the solution of how ten billion people will live sustainably in our world is our driver for our visions, our values ​​and our principles.

preaLeaders.boxHeader_subTitle_1Block: Superlative and diversified expertise. Real estate, science and technology.
preaLeaders.boxHeader_subTitle_2Block: Our success is driven by our culture
preaLeaders.boxHeader_supervisor_subTitle: Innovation meets tradition. Even more values and experience.
preaLeaders.gridCard_1SubTitle_1Block:
To operate sustainably, you need a set of rules for sustainable working. Every year we gather our experience and expertise and expand our set of rules for safe cooperation. 
 
 Learn more about Compiance
preaLeaders.gridCard_1SubTitle_2Block:
Using innovative technology, we are able to digitise ESG in all its facets, evaluate it and provide the results with the mission for a sustainable world with maximum results. 
 
Learn more about sustainability
preaLeaders.gridCard_1SubTitle_3Block: Company goals,Projects we are working on and growth trajectory of our company
preaLeaders.gridCard_1SubTitle_4Block: Our culture constantly drives us forward and brings success to our company,We are driven by innovation and sustainability.
preaLeaders.gridCard_1SubTitle_5Block: Short distances. Quick contacts. Common solutions. Direct contact with our job advertisements.
preaLeaders.gridCard_title_1Block: Highest compliance standard in the real estate industry

who-we-are.quote_1: We advise, we develop, we build, and all from a single source, with the help of our AI.
who-we-are.quote_2: Everything we do is based on the belief that investors, owners and users need clarity at every point in the real estate cycle. For more informed decisions, better results and more sustainable growth.
who-we-are.quote_3: The connectivity between our intelligent technologies and the ecosystem of the real estate and construction industry is the heart of PREA and one of the fundamental guiding principles of our vision.
who-we-are.quote_4: Acting sustainably within the industry brings with it great challenges. We are firmly convinced that they can only be mastered if we rethink values ​​together.
